content.question: In line 3, the metaphor of maiorum vestigia sequi suggests that wise men should

choices.label: visit the places their ancestors lived
imitate the actions of their ancestors
pass down great ideas to their students
make friends with more powerful people

content.answer: imitate the actions of their ancestors
